notes.traces: best-effort via debug_traceTransaction(callTracer); may be missing if node doesn't support; used to extract trace_edges
notes.state_diff: best-effort via debug_traceTransaction(prestateTracer); Anvil limitation: only pre-state available (mode='prestate_only'). balance_after and storage_after are null. Balances normalized from hex to decimal strings.
notes.approvals: ERC20 Approval events decoded from receipt logs; enables allowance abuse detection
notes.allowance_edges: approval events as directed edges for graph analysis
notes.address_profile: EXPANDED: now captures ALL tx activity (tx_out_count, tx_in_count, gas_spent_wei, total_gas_used, first_seen_ts, last_seen_ts) in addition to ETH/ERC20 flows. Every participant is now profileable.
notes.contract_calls: NEW: one row per transaction, extracted with method_id, status, gas costs, and timing. Enables contract interaction pattern detection.
notes.method_stats: NEW: aggregated statistics per (to_address, method_id) pair. Includes count, success/revert counts, unique callers, and temporal window. Identifies hot methods.
notes.trace_edges: NEW: call graph edges extracted from callTracer output. Each edge: caller, callee, call_type, value, input_selector, depth. Enables execution flow reconstruction.
notes.revert_reasons: NEW: best-effort extraction of revert reasons from trace output. reason field may be null if unavailable. Only written for reverted txs.
notes.mempool_pending: OPTIONAL: best-effort capture of pending txs in local Anvil simulation. NOTE: Mempool is ephemeral and not queryable historically on real nodes. This is simulation-specific; do not expect equivalent data in real incidents.
notes.codes: eth_getCode for all snapshotted addresses (contracts + bounded EOAs)
notes.storage_snapshots: targeted storage reads for key contract slots (safe, minimal)
notes.abi_export: ABI files (JSON), runtime bytecode (*.bin), and address mappings in ABI/ directory. Bytecode is runtime (deployedBytecode preferred) for on-chain detection.
